release.Two

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • release.Two.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
    Monster class that holds all of the monsters statistics and represents and in game monster.
    Version:
    Fall 2018
    Author:
    Michelle Vu, Alex Porter, and Justin Kaukonen
